arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ
footnotes: Kustarehe kwao kwa umri mrefu na maisha mema hakutowakinga hata chembe na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Kwani adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu itakuja tu, kama si leo kesho. Wala hapana kheri katika neema ambayo khatima yake ni adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
